text: 13.14: Kis 20.9-10; Lo 5.13-14; Mt 12.10; Mk 3.2; Ru 6.7; Zo 5.16Zisas Sabatar mba mbigar kurigi ne nzuav mba Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena gari guman pan ne nzuav guigira Zisas ga nzuav ndav shigap, khaŋ mba gumgi gu mbigi ga nzuai, “Nza ŋaari ga mbui rari mporathɨgi, nde mba raa then zɨv wari won rɨmrɨɨ vhɨzɨ. Nde thaŋ nzuav zav Sabatar mba ŋaara khavgi?”
